# langsmith_usage_limit (Resource)

Manages a LangSmith usage limit.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "langsmith_usage_limit" "example" {
  limit_type  = "traces"
  limit_value = 100000
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `limit_type` (String) The type of usage limit.
- `limit_value` (Number) The limit value.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the usage limit.
- `tenant_id` (String) The tenant ID.
- `updated_at` (String) The last update timestamp.
